body.p:
To his Excellency Thomas E Bramlett
Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Your Petitioners Mason Baily C. C. Hanks & William H Tutt States that they stand indicted in the Wolfe Circuit Court in Three cases charged with the offense of 1st Mason Baily with shooting with intent to kill 2nd C C Hanks ^WH Tutt^ with Grand larceny Horse Stealing & 3d Wm H Tutt with the offense of Carring Consealed deadly weapons they further state that at the time of Committing Said offense's that they were all regular Soldiers of the Confederate Army and acting under orders of their Superior officers and that they did not feloniously committ said offences or any part thereof We therefore ask your excellency to pardon us and that we be hense released from Said charges and will forever pray

Mason Baily
C. C. Hanks &
Wm H Tutt

We the undersigned Citizens of Wolfe County Ky recomend the foregoing Petitioners as fit Subjects for executive Clemency & believe that they ought to be pardoned and will therefore ask that same be done &c Yours &c
